showError

public void showError(java.lang.String message,
                      java.lang.Exception e)
Pop up the error dialog and show the error. It shows the java-error-message and the stack-trace if "details" is pressed.

Parameters:
message - the message which will be shown to the user
e - the exception which has been thrown
